overview: Do not let her sweet smile and innocent look fool you. Vivid's new contract girl, Malezia, has a lot on her mind. Deep in Malezia invites you on a trip where you learn how she gives her all for her job. Go on a sexy shopping trip. And you'll learn the right way how to misbehave in a sex club. Plus, learn how she keeps her boyfriends coming back for more. It's a sexy trip that you may never want to leave.
title: Deep In Malezia
